dc_title_s: Thacker's reduced survey map of India
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:4,435,200. 1 in. = 70 mi. (E 64°--E 100°/N 40°--N 4°). Shows international and administrative boundaries, railways, roads, steamer routes. Date on index 1907; date on map 1906. Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Insets: [Madras] -- Calcutta -- Bombay -- [Nicobar Islands, on the same scale] -- Assam, Cachar and Sylhet -- Darjiling & Jalpaiguri -- Kangura -- Chittagong -- Dehra Dun and Kumaun -- Ceylon. Ancillary maps: [Egypt to Laos] -- India : [wheat, rice cotton] -- India : [sugar cane, indigo, coffee]. "The Edinburgh Geographical Institute"--lower left. "Copyright -- John Bartholomew & Co."--lower right. Accompanied by index ([64]p. ; 26 cm.). Map and index bound in blue cloth cover. 97 x 85 cm
dc_creator_sm: Bartholomew, J.G. (John George) 1860-1920. John Bartholomew & Co
